special_powers.description: Modify this character's range value by +2 and this character can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast.
Modify this character's combat values by +1 and this character can use Probability Control if it cannot already.

Orange squares are the edge of the Helicarrier squares. At the end of each turn, if a character that can't use the Flight ability is occupying one of these squares, place them in the nearest non-orange square that they could be placed in and give them an action token.

special_powers.name: Stair Squares
special_powers.description: If you are using map S-4, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and place them in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place the character in the nearest square they could be placed in.

special_powers.name: Balcony Below Squares
special_powers.description: If you are using map S-4, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and roll a d6, adding 1 to the result if they can use the Flight ability. On a result of 4-6 place them in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place the character in the nearest square they could be placed in.

Orange squares are the edge of the Helicarrier squares. At the end of each turn, if a character that can't use the Flight ability is occupying one of these squares, place them in the nearest non-orange square that they could be placed in and give them an action token.

Orange squares are 10,000 feet below squares. Characters can't move into or occupy these squares. If a character's knock back path is stopped by one of these squares, deal that character an additional 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: Stair Squares
special_powers.description: If you are using map S-2, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and place them in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place the character in the nearest square they could be placed in.

special_powers.name: Balcony Below Squares
special_powers.description: If you are using map S-2, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and roll a d6, adding 1 to the result if they can use the Flight ability. On a result of 4-6 place them in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place the character in the nearest square they could be placed in.
